title: Breadcrumbs: overflow
code:
<gds-flex width="80%" align-items="center">
  <gds-breadcrumbs width="100%">
    <gds-link href="#">
      <gds-icon-home-open slot="lead"></gds-icon-home-open>
      Home
    </gds-link>
  
    <gds-link href="#">
      <gds-icon-folder slot="lead"></gds-icon-folder>
      Documents
    </gds-link>
  
    <gds-button rank="tertiary" size="small">
      <gds-icon-dot-grid-one-horizontal></gds-icon-dot-grid-one-horizontal>
    </gds-button>
  
    <gds-link href="#">
      <gds-icon-settings-gear slot="lead"></gds-icon-settings-gear>
      Settings
    </gds-link>
  
    <gds-text> Current page </gds-text>
  </gds-breadcrumbs>
</gds-flex>
